text:
Cambridge Medical Robotics | Embedded/Software Engineer | Cambridge, UK | ONSITE | http://cmedrobotics.com/careers

Cambridge Medical Robotics is a private company developing the next-generation universal robotic system for minimal access surgery. Our vision is to make keyhole surgery universally accessible and affordable by significantly expanding the range of procedures that can be performed robotically.

We are looking for (lots of) highly capable individuals, with a desire to work in an agile start-up environment to help us achieve this vision.

To get in touch: careers@cmedrobotics.com
